text: Sony Music Latin is a record company that specializes in Latin music. It is owned by Sony Music Entertainment. ==List of artists on Sony Music Latin== *Alexis & Fido *Ana Gabriel *Banda Machos *Calle 13 *Camila *Chayanne *Cumbre Norteña *Da' Zoo *Daddy Yankee *Draco Rosa *Dyland & Lenny *Ednita Nazario *El Canto Del Loco *El Compa Chuy *El Gran Combo de Puerto Rico *Fito Paez *Fey *Franco De Vita *Gerardo Ortiz *Gilberto Santa Rosa *Gustavo Cerati *Ha*Ash *Ian Tresidder *Intocable *Julieta Venegas *Kalimba *Kany Garcia *La Quinta Estacion *Lila Downs *Los Originales De San Juan *Los Pikadientes de Caborca *Los Reyes De Arranque *Marc Anthony *Mennores *NG2 *NOTA *Noel Schajris *Oscar D'León *Pedro Capo *Pitbull *Playa Limbo *Raphael *Reik *Ricky Martin *Rocio Durcal *Shakira *Thalía *Toby Love *Vicente Fernandez *Vicentico *Voltio *Yanni *Yuridia == Other websites == *Official website *Official Facebook Page *Official twitter Category:Latin music Category:Sony Category:Companies based in Miami Category:1980 establishments in the United States
title: Sony Music Latin
